mapper.insert: insert into oc_report (reportno, reporter, dno, content) values (oc_report_seq.nextval, #{reporter}, #{dno}, #{content})
mapper.select: select writer, user_image, report_content, reportdate from oc_bandoc order by reportno desc

select oc_report.dno, oc_document.writer, oc_document.content, tag, image, mapXY, mapLoc, goodcnt, user_image, reportno, oc_report.content report_content, reporter, TO_CHAR(reportdate,'yyyy"년" mm"월" dd"일" hh24"시" mi"분"') reportdate from oc_document, oc_user, oc_report where oc_document.dno = oc_report.dno AND oc_user.user_id = oc_document.writer order by reportno desc
mapper.insert: insert into oc_bandoc (dno, writer, content, tag, image, mapXY, mapLoc, goodcnt, user_image, reportno, report_content, reporter, reportdate) (select oc_report.dno, oc_document.writer, oc_document.content, tag, image, mapXY, mapLoc, goodcnt, user_image, reportno, oc_report.content report_content, reporter, reportdate from oc_document, oc_user, oc_report where oc_document.dno = oc_report.dno AND oc_user.user_id = oc_document.writer AND reportno = #{reportno})
